    • Constructor Detail

      • PianoRollModel

        public PianoRollModel()
        Create a new piano roll model.

      • PianoRollModel

        public PianoRollModel​(java.lang.String filePath,
                      java.lang.String fileName)
               throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Created a new piano roll model based on an imported pattern.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the midi file corresponding to the desired pattern
        fileName - midi file name corresponding to the desired pattern
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - if the File does not point to valid MIDI file data recognized by the system
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

        public void setOctave​(int i)

        Parameters:
